creditline: Gift of Mrs. John P. Rutherfurd in memory of her father, Mr. Thomas Shevlin
description: Predominantly decorated with blue, which appears on the acanthus-like scrolls on the scalloped and gilded edge and in the molded indentations encircling the central area; central area is filled with a fleurs-fines bouquet in the Paul-Antoine style parrot, tulip, roses, chrysanthemums; signed with mark of Paul-Antoine Hannong
markings: \'HP\' (P in superscript), in blue, on base
title: Platter
